resources: EventListing No Internet Connection! RETRY\ Piye kabare arek-arek Event Creator Malang? Apakah kamu memiliki masalah dalam pengelolaan event? Atau ingin tahu lebih banyak tentang cara untuk mempromosikan event kamu? Dapatkan semua infomrasi lengkap tentang pengelolaan event secara cuma-cuma, hanya di Loket.com Road to Malang. Catat tanggal dan tempatnya ya! As the pioneer of Ticket Management Service in Indonesia, LOKET is here to answer all the problems of the entertainment industry since 2013. LOKET commits to provide end-to-end event technology solutions in creating the best experience in every event, both for the event creators and audiences.
